data.title: Can AI help you find the perfect holiday gift? We put it to the test with shoppers
data.description: Cyber Monday can be overwhelming, especially if you have a few people on your list who are notoriously hard to shop for.
data.author: Rachel Whelan
data.keywords: ai,shopper,list,test,dr. sachin modi,few people,good gift,budget,bill oberer,size 8–10,specific information,favorite color,hobby,hoodie,operation
